text:
Hey, Rachel! 
Circuit Breaker may have come to an end (sorta) but we sure hope your fitness routine won't! To further motivate you, we'd like to offer you this: a 20% discount off all items under NomadX via our new website (link in bio) which includes fitness apparel, beauty and skincare products and loads of other cool things. 
To enjoy this limited-time-only discount, simply quote "ECM20" upon checking out!
